title: House Committees Find No Wrongdoing In 2012 Benghazi Attack
teaser: Two House committees of jurisdiction have found no wrongdoing in the 2012 attack on the American diplomatic post in Benghazi, Libya. The House Select Committee created by a House vote this year will nevertheless press on with its own investigation.
contentencoded: Copyright 2014 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
